title: Looking for Duo I'm S4 Support main
body:
hey guys as the title says im looking for a duo partner preferably an adc,We'd first do a few normals to sync up then go in to rank if interested.

i main support but can easily play adc, jg and mid

supports i like include :- nami, sona, naut, leo, lux, soraka,

can learn others if needed

replies.body: yo man, im an adc main, hit me up if you want to play together, i mostly play kogmaw, ezreal, and jinx. im also s5 atm :)
Hey man im a S2 Lee main, and i can play any role probably adc the best after jg.
